resources.string: Currency conversion is an easy way to calculate exchange rates between Rupiah (IDR) and other currencies such as Dollar (USD). Start now!

The Currency Conversion App is an Android application that helps users easily and quickly convert currency values from one type to another.

This application was created for the Mobile Programming class as part of the first assessment assignment.

Currency exchange rate data is obtained from https://wise.com/gb/currency-converter and updated as of March 31, 2025.
